name: Catapult VR demo
description:
This is an early prototype of a Catapult VR game. For HTC Vive AND Oculus Touch.

Warning for Oculus Touch users - you still need Steam VR to play this game.

Pick up the boulder, load it, target and launch. Destroy the enemy castle!

You can move and rotate the catapult by black handle on a bucket. To launch - grab and pull the lever on the side.

Controls:

Movement - hold grip buttons on both controllers and wave them around as if you are walking

Buttons - to press any buttons, just do it as if you press them in real life, no additional input needed

Ammo types:

Stone boulder - basic ammo, deals direct damage and pushes blocks

Bomb - unlocks after 2 levels are cleared, explodes on impact, deals area damage and pushes back blocks. Alternatively, can be timed for up to 5 seconds.

Launch instructions:

  1. Download and unpack.
  2. Launch SteamVR
  3. Launch and play!
